author: Dude111
title: 5 books
text: Posts: 3,327 Here is how it works: Pick 5 books at random. Now take a random sentence from each and make it into a paragraph.. (Not as easy as it looks) Here are the books i used (Found them in the basement) Book 1 > Little bunny follows his nose Book 2 > A fourth reader Stickney Book 3 > The take of Jemima Puddle Duck Book 4 > The sweet smell of christmas Book 5 > Babys Peek a boo album One day after lunch,Little Bunnys mother said "Why don't you go out and play?" And all that night,the little boy dreamt he heard the birds in the tree. I wish i could meet with that fowl. After breakfast,father bear pulled little bear on his sled. Now who's this playing peek-a-boo? I should have known. OF COURSE,ITS YOU!
